snippet: Sweltering temperatures and a lack of rain are threatening what was expected to be the largest corn crop in generations.
abstract: Sweltering temperatures and a lack of rain are threatening what was expected to be a bountiful corn harvest across the Midwest; drought conditions are especially dangerous as corn approaches its crucial pollination phase.
lead_paragraph: Sweltering temperatures and a lack of rain are threatening what was expected to be the largest corn crop in generations.

headline.seo: For Midwest Corn Crop, the Pressure Rises, Like the Heat
headline.main: Searing Sun and Drought Shrivel Corn in Midwest
headline.print_headline: Searing Sun And Drought Shrivel Corn In Midwest
